page.title: 13Sargents Ice Cream 2
page.content: Milk that was once available in the village now comes from outside,approx imately 70 gallons every day delivered in churns.We found out how ice-cream was made.Milk was put in a pasteurisor to kill the bacteria.It was then transfered to the freezers and ingredients added and mixed together taking 40 minutes.It was then placed in large freezers until ready for use. Each day 100 gallon batches is made up for use within a few days or the flavour would be impaired.The company has competition from the manufacturers and retailers in Scunthorpe but they produce different sorts.Links between conpany personel and the local community are strong although there is a rapid turnover in staff.There are some points of conflict with cars in the summer time.Despite this the owner hopes to expand in the future.
